title: Welcome (Lite)
content: This is the minimal Career example (Foundations only). Use it to compare against the full Career graph and Project graphs.

title: Profile
content: The entry point for your CV summary.

title: Foundations
content: Education, Experience, and Community connect directly from the profile.

title: Compare
content: Switch templates to compare: Career (full) shows the layered pipeline; Task Management shows start-to-end project execution.
